channel.title: Skybase PVP!
channel.description:
Want a PvP game that gives you: Tons of action! PvP! Teamwork! Great community! Great Owners!
Skybase PvP is a gamemode where you start out on a island, from there you must: gather resources. once you have done that you can do two things, build your own skybase and wait for people to come to you. or you can rush to the middle get some diamonds, stuff in chests. and then you can attack other islands. last team standing wins!
If you would like to try this out, please go to -->http://skybasepvp.com/home
